Text.Name: Story_LingZhiGet
Text.Desc: [NAME] arrived at [PLACE] and recalled that there is supposed to be a Spirit Root that grows here. After searching around it turned out that the area was replete with Earth Qi, there was something out of the ordinary here.

Text.Name: Story_LingZhiBeg
Text.Desc: [NAME] arrived at [PLACE] and recalled that this is where Spirit Root grows.

Text.Name: Story_XiuLian_Jin
Text.Desc: [NAME] found that the area was replete with Metal Qi and people rarely came here, thus making it an excellent spot for Practice.

Text.Name: Story_XiuLian_Mu
Text.Desc: [NAME] found that the area was replete with Wood Qi and people rarely came here, thus making it an excellent spot for Practice.

Text.Name: Story_XiuLian_Shui
Text.Desc: [NAME] found that the area was replete with Water Qi and people rarely came here, thus making it an excellent spot for Practice.

Text.Name: Story_XiuLian_Huo
Text.Desc: [NAME] found that the area was replete with Fire Qi and people rarely came here, thus making it an excellent spot for Practice.

Text.Name: Story_XiuLian_Tu
Text.Desc: [NAME] found that the area was replete with Earth Qi and people rarely came here, thus making it an excellent spot for Practice.

Text.Name: HighFind_Jin
Text.Desc: [NAME] heard that this place was suffused with supernatural power and suspected that this place must be concealing some sort of treasure.

Text.Name: HighFind_Mu
Text.Desc: [NAME] heard that this place was suffused with supernatural power and suspected that this place must be concealing some sort of treasure.

Text.Name: HighFind_Shui
Text.Desc: [NAME] heard that this place was suffused with supernatural power and suspected that this place must be concealing some sort of treasure.

Text.Name: HighFind_Huo
Text.Desc: [NAME] heard that this place was suffused with supernatural power and suspected that this place must be concealing some sort of treasure.

Text.Name: HighFind_Tu
Text.Desc: [NAME] heard that this place was suffused with supernatural power and suspected that this place must be concealing some sort of treasure.

Text.Name: Story_MuBai
Text.Desc: This place is where an Immortal was once secluded. Rumor has it has not rained here once after the Immortal's ascension.

Text.Name: Story_QiSha
Text.Desc: The Seven-Slaughtering Formation has shrouded this area. If you haven't been ordered to venture in, it would be better not to risk one's life doing so.

Text.Name: Story_JianZhong
Text.Desc: Although closely guarded, this place holds the Blue Lotus Temple's swords of ages. If one is able to enter, then, with Luck, there is a chance to leave with the sword.
Text.Selections.0.Display: Search for a sword in Bladesmith Tomb

Text.Name: BaoZang_YuJingTan
Text.Desc: This place holds the Metal Chest of the Emperor of Demons. It would seem that the treasure has been sucked in by a magnetic core, so no one has been able to retrieve it.

Text.Name: Story_YiJieLieFeng
Text.Desc: Legend has it that this fractured space gave birth to the second war between Immortals and Demons and that afterwards there was no trace left. It has been gone for thousands of years, but unexpectedly, it has reappeared in this realm for now. The rift is extremely dangerous, and without a special kind of Luck, even the most experienced immortals can become lost in there.
Text.Selections.0.Display: An Otherworld Rift full of festive spirit.
Text.Selections.1.Display: An Otherworld Rift full of majestic spirit.

Text.Name: BaoZang_LiHenHai
Text.Desc: Who could have thought that there could be such an amazing place as this in heaven or on earth?! Who knows what secrets this place is hiding!

Text.Name: BaoZang_XieDiLing
Text.Desc: This is the Mausoleum of the leader of the Demon sect from the south. It has been sealed off though and no one can enter.

Text.Name: BaoZang_TaoHuaZhang
Text.Desc: This is a desolate place full of miasma that not even cultivators can resist, one breath will take your life. The only way to get through here alive is to transform your body into something else.

Text.Name: BaoZang_ChiLianYuan
Text.DisplayName: Explore the Secrets of the Emerald Palace
Text.Desc: [NAME] entered the Cave Mansion according to the Secret Law. According to the "Record of the Immortals" what was left is hidden in three locations: The first is in the Pavilion of Fate in the Emerald Palace's Immortal Abode, the second is in the Artifact Crafting area in the Hall of Ten-thousand Treasures, and the third is in the Scriptorium's secluded meditation area.
Text.Selections.1.Display: Enter the Hall of Ten-thousand Treasures

Text.Name: BaoZang_XuanKong
Text.Desc: [NAME] entered the Jade Immortal Abode using the "Record of the Immortals" guidance to get past traps.

Text.Name: BaoZang_QingLianShan
Text.Desc: [NAME] came to the South Seas according to the secret manual. After searching the area numerous times, the drop of true water was finally found in the boundless waves. [NAME] touched it and was able to enter the water. A towering, blue Immortal mountain appeared up ahead. Peering off into the distance, it looked like there's a bamboo hut on the mountainside. The peak was shrouded by strange jet-black clouds from which lightning was shooting.
Text.Selections.1.Display: Proceed to the bamboo hut on the mountainside

Text.Name: BaoZang_QingLianShan1
Text.DisplayName: A Strange Array on the Mountaintop
Text.Desc: [NAME] had just gotten near the peak when there was a wave of pressure that washed over. There was a Heavenly Tribulation around the peak of Mt. Caerulea! [NAME] stepped valiantly onto the mountaintop and found that some force had flattened it and left an array on it.

Text.Name: BaoZang_QingLianShan2
Text.Desc: [NAME] was surprised to find that the hut was surprisingly spartan with only a bed and a desk inside. It didn't look like there was anything out of the ordinary. [NAME] after a quick search, it seems like there's something shining on the desk.

Text.Name: BaoZang_QingLianShan2_end
Text.Desc: The array diagram has already been taken, there's nothing else of interest here.

Text.Name: BaoZang_QingLianShan21
Text.Desc: [NAME] found that there were four grooves on the diagram that seemed to be the key to the center of it. Only one groove was shining, the other three were inactive.

Text.Name: BaoZang_QingLianShan3
Text.Desc: Following the road to the mountain, [NAME] found that the Qi here was richer than anywhere else. That an Earthly Paradise such as this could be hidden in only a drop of water is unimaginable.

Text.Name: BaoZang_DengXian
Text.Desc: [NAME] had heard that the Immortal Summit had teachings left behind by Emperor Donghua from long ago. [NAME] tried to see what could be found.

Text.Name: BaoZang_FeiLei
Text.Desc: It was said that the Immortal Caerulea ascended here and left an incredible secret. [NAME] couldn't help but be curious to see what it could be.

Text.Name: BaoZang_FeiLei1
Text.Desc: Mt. Shu said the key of the Thunderclap Cave is a volume left by the Sage. They will gift anyone who can take back the volume.

Text.Name: LingWu_DanXia
Text.Desc: [NAME] was shocked by the majestic vista at Sunshade Precipice.

Text.Name: LingWu_JiuHua1
Text.DisplayName: The Land of the Hidden Dragon
Text.Desc: [NAME] stood before the Wyvern Pool and recalled how in ancient times great power had been collected here when the dragon was released here, and couldn't just stand around.

Text.Name: LingWu_JiuHua2
Text.Desc: [NAME] stood before the fossilized Phoenixwood at Phoenix Cliff, sighed with emotion, and seemed to hear what sounded like a phoenix call.

Text.Name: LingWu_LongHu
Text.Desc: [NAME] was left speechless by the flowing white waters of Skypass Falls, its force even surpassed that of a cultivator possessing the golden core.

Text.Name: Story_TianJi
Text.Desc: A regular cavern inside the Drake Cave. It looks fairly ordinary, but emits a strange and mystical aura, which cannot be sensed unless it was someone who knew the Drake Cave inside and out. There seems to be some peculiar, natural patterns at the entry of the cavern.

Text.Name: Story_HighFind_SpPlace
Text.Desc: [NAME] went to the Battlefield of the Clash of Immortals and Demons in search of some lucky chance.
